data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 7, Sapporo's Daiki Suga misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 9, Sapporo are coming forward and Daiki Suga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Urawa are pushing forward but Thomas Deng's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
An attacking Urawa player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Kenyu Sugimoto nets and Urawa now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Sapporo.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 20, Urawa take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Kenyu Sugimoto.
Great play from Takuya Aoki to set up the goal.
Lucas Fernandes (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 23, Daiki Suga of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Sapporo.
Jay Bothroyd keeps Sapporoâ€™s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 1-2.
In the minute 31, That's a fine assist from Lucas Fernandes.
Chanathip Songkrasin (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 32, Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Sapporo drives forward and Jay Bothroyd gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 35, Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Jay Bothroyd.
Akito Fukumori instrumental with a fine assist.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Fernandes for Sapporo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sapporo's Lucas Fernandes is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Takuma Arano with Kim Min-Tae.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Jay Bothroyd's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Urawa at Sapporo.
Throw-in for Urawa at Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Leonardo is replacing Shinzo Koroki for the away team.
In the minute 55, Urawa make their second substitution with Quenten Martinus replacing Yuki Muto.
Sapporo pushes forward through Chanathip Songkrasin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Sapporo.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Urawa in the half of Sapporo.
Kai Shibato is on a sub for Ewerton for Urawa.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 64, Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Sapporo make their third substitution with Douglas replacing Chanathip Songkrasin.
In the minute 64, Anderson Lopes is on a sub for Yoshiaki Komai for Sapporo.
Sapporo takes a corner from the left.
Sapporo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sapporo take a 3-2 lead thanks to Hiroki Miyazawa.
Great play from Akito Fukumori to set up the goal.
In the minute 69, Anderson Lopes of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sapporo pushes forward through Anderson Lopes, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
Goal kick for Urawa at Sapporo.
The away team replace Katsuya Iwatake with Ryosuke Yamanaka.
In the minute 73, Koya Yuruki is replacing Takahiro Sekine for the away team.
Urawa drives forward and Leonardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 75, Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Sapporo.
Goal! Tomoaki Makino equalizes to bring the score to 3-3.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Sapporo.
Sapporo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ryosuke Shindo of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Tomoki Takamine is on a sub for Jay Bothroyd for Sapporo.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 84, Douglas of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Sapporo are coming forward and Douglas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Urawa needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Sapporo make their fifth substitution with Kosuke Shirai replacing Daiki Suga.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Urawa.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Urawa.
Shunta Tanaka's header is off-target for Sapporo.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Free kick Urawa.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Sapporo.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-4.
Goal! Kai Shibato gives Urawa a 3-4 lead.
Quenten Martinus with an assist there.
